algorithm_technique: Preorder traversal (iterative with stack) on both trees simultaneously
problem_summary_simple: Find the node in a cloned binary tree that corresponds to a given target node in the original tree.
problem_summary_technical: Perform a simultaneous traversal (e.g., preorder) of the original and cloned trees to find the matching node.
key_insights: The problem requires finding a node in the cloned tree that has the same structure and value as the target node in the original tree.
A traversal (like preorder, inorder, or postorder) can be used to visit nodes in both trees in parallel.
When the target node is found in the original tree during traversal, the corresponding node in the cloned tree is the answer.
